key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global semiconductor shortages and raw material disruptions
Intense market competition from established players like TE Connectivity, Bosch, and Continental
Economic sensitivity tied to the automotive industry
Regulatory risks from stringent environmental and safety standards
Ongoing labor and quality issues impacting operations
environmental_issues: Subject to stringent environmental regulations, increasing compliance costs
Commitment to reducing Scope 1 and 2 emissions by 45% by 2030 and achieving carbon neutrality by 2050
social_issues: Monitoring labor and quality issues that could impact operations
Robust Human Rights and Working Conditions Policy to prevent child labor and human trafficking
